Weapon.Name: Chivalrous Sword
Weapon.Description: A sword that bears the markings of noble knights from ancient times. It posseses an unyielding aura.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a powerful slash, the sword strikes the enemy, leaving them temporarily stunned.

Weapon.Name: Valiant Lance
Weapon.Description: An imposing lance used by daring knights in times of old. Its reach is both terrifying and awe-inspiring.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The player thrusts their lance, penetrating enemy's armour.

Weapon.Name: Guardian Shield
Weapon.Description: An almost impenetrable shield that has seen countless battles. It resonates with an aura of protection.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The player braces and charges, slamming their shield into the enemy.
